items.details:
Upcoming Tests

Science  - Topic 3 - Weather - November 26th
Math - Topic 6 - Area - November 26th

World Heritage Day – Final Reminder

Tomorrow is World Heritage Day! When you arrive, please use the morning to put the final touches on your Ireland booth. After that, you will be teaching visitors about Ireland, so please ensure you have prepared something to say and are familiar with the information you will be teaching.

If you'd like to give a prize, please bring some small candies.
Any Irish food must arrive before 10 a.m.
Come prepared, work as a team, and have fun showcasing Ireland!

Korean

Extra reading ( I have added some new stories)

TO IMPROVE READING AND EMBED LEARNING, YOU SHOULD BE LOGGING INTO READWORKS

Please go to ReadWorks and complete some of the stories assigned. They will assist you with your schoolwork and also enhance your overall reading skills.

Go to www.readworks.org/student 

Enter our class code YU6GQ2
Your password is 1234 unless you already changed it.

Math

Complete Additional Practice 6-6

I have added New Khan Academy related to area.

Please have your child practice a little Khan Academy math each night
 at https://www.khanacademy.org/join/VK6QDS9E to help strengthen their skills.

Science 

Complete pages 120-123 in the science book to prepare for the test next week.

Here is a blooket that will help with the science test next week.
